name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル1

description: The first level of Impel Down, known as the Crimson Hell. This level serves as the main entrance to the underwater prison and features a forest of red trees with blade-like leaves.

keyEvents.title: Blackbeard Pirates Arrive at Impel Down
keyEvents.description: Marshall D. Teach (Blackbeard) and his crew force their way into Level 1 of Impel Down with mysterious intentions.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of Blackbeard's infiltration of the world's most secure prison, which will have far-reaching consequences.

keyEvents.title: Shiryu Confronts the Blackbeard Pirates
keyEvents.description: Shiryu of the Rain appears on Level 1 to confront Blackbeard and his crew.
keyEvents.significance: The fateful meeting between Shiryu and Blackbeard that will lead to Shiryu joining the Blackbeard Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Blackbeard and Shiryu's Conversation
keyEvents.description: Blackbeard and Shiryu engage in conversation rather than fighting, coming to some form of understanding.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the groundwork for Shiryu's betrayal of Impel Down and alliance with Blackbeard.

statusHistory.reason: Level 1 serves as the entry point for Blackbeard's infiltration

name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル2

description: The second level of Impel Down, known as the Beast Hell. This level is inhabited by dangerous creatures including Manticores, Basilisks, and Puzzle Scorpions.

keyEvents.title: Buggy and Galdino Trapped on Level 2
keyEvents.description: Buggy and Galdino find themselves trapped on Level 2, unable to proceed due to a barrier created by Magellan's deadly poison.
keyEvents.significance: Separates Buggy and Mr. 3 from the main escape group, setting up their separate subplot.

statusHistory.reason: Level 2 becomes a trap for Buggy and Galdino due to Magellan's poison barrier

name.japanese: インペルダウン レベル4

description: The fourth level of Impel Down, known as the Blazing Hell. This level features a massive pool of boiling blood heated by flames from below, creating an extremely hot and dangerous environment.

keyEvents.title: Three Jailer Beasts Arrive to Stop the Escapees
keyEvents.description: Minokoala, Minorhinoceros, and Minozebra arrive to confront Luffy's escape party on Level 4.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Level 4 as the battleground between the escapees and Impel Down's elite guards.

keyEvents.title: Luffy, Jinbe, and Crocodile One-Shot the Jailer Beasts
keyEvents.description: The three powerful pirates each defeat one Jailer Beast with a single attack on Level 4.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the overwhelming power of the alliance on Level 4 of Impel Down.

keyEvents.title: Hannyabal Ordered to Hold the Escapees
keyEvents.description: Hannyabal receives orders to hold off the escaping prisoners on Level 4 until Magellan arrives.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the confrontation between Hannyabal and Luffy on this level.

keyEvents.title: Ivankov Battles Sadi
keyEvents.description: Ivankov engages in battle with Sadi on Level 4 to allow Luffy to proceed.
keyEvents.significance: Level 4 becomes the site of multiple simultaneous battles during the escape.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Confronts Hannyabal
keyEvents.description: Luffy encounters Vice Warden Hannyabal on Level 4, who prepares to fight him.
keyEvents.significance: Level 4 serves as the location for the upcoming confrontation and Hannyabal's defining moment.

statusHistory.reason: Level 4 serves as the main battleground for the escape attempt
